MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Stafford Road, Ravenhead Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.32PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further fault finding investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.45AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.38PM on 25th February 2021.
